page.title: 09GUITING POWER.W.I.
page.content: W.I. stands for Women's Institute. It meets in the Village Hall on the 2nd Wednesday of each month.There are 28 members, and about 22 come to each meeting.Our teacher is the President this year. At each meeting,there is W.I. business,then a talk on such subjects as antiques,cooking,handicrafts,health etc.,followed by tea and competition. Members go to the Theatre sometimes and have a summer excursion. There is a choir whose members join in the Carol Concert at Cheltenham every Christmas. The W.I. raises money to pay for the magazine for the elderly, and members deliver the copies. Money is raised by Sales,and serving teas to visitors. There is a W.I. at Naunton also.
